00043 #ifndef __VALIDATORS__
00044 #define __VALIDATORS__
00045 
00046 class Validator
00047 {
00048 private:
00049    wxVariant mConverted;
00050 
00051 public:
00052    Validator() {};
00053    virtual ~Validator() {};
00054    void SetConverted (const wxVariant &v)
00055    {
00056       mConverted = v;
00057    }
00058    const wxVariant &GetConverted()
00059    {
00060       return mConverted;
00061    }
00062 
00064    virtual bool Validate(const wxVariant &v)
00065    {
00066       SetConverted(v);
00067       return true;
00068    }
00069 
00072    virtual wxString GetDescription() const
00073    {
00074       return wxT("any value");
00075    }
00076 
00078    virtual Validator *GetClone() const
00079    {
00080       return new Validator();
00081    }
00082 };
00083 
00084 class OptionValidator : public Validator
00085 {
00086 private:
00087    wxArrayString mOptions;
00088 
00089 public:
00090    void AddOption(const wxString &option)
00091    {
00092       mOptions.Add(option);
00093    }
00094    void AddOptions(const wxArrayString &options)
00095    {
00096       mOptions.insert(mOptions.begin(), options.begin(), options.end());
00097    }
00098    virtual bool Validate(const wxVariant &v)
00099    {
00100       SetConverted(v);
00101       return (mOptions.Index(v.GetString()) != wxNOT_FOUND);
00102    }
00103    virtual wxString GetDescription() const
00104    {
00105       wxString desc = wxT("one of: ");
00106       int optionCount = mOptions.GetCount();
00107       int i = 0;
00108       for (i = 0; i+1 < optionCount; ++i)
00109       {
00110          desc += mOptions[i] + wxT(", ");
00111       }
00112       desc += mOptions[optionCount-1];
00113       return desc;
00114    }
00115    virtual Validator *GetClone() const
00116    {
00117       OptionValidator *v = new OptionValidator();
00118       v->mOptions = mOptions;
00119       return v;
00120    }
00121 };
00122 
00123 class BoolValidator : public Validator
00124 {
00125 public:
00126    virtual bool Validate(const wxVariant &v)
00127    {
00128       bool val;
00129       if (!v.Convert(&val)) return false;
00130       SetConverted(val);
00131       return GetConverted().IsType(wxT("bool"));
00132    }
00133    virtual wxString GetDescription() const
00134    {
00135       return wxT("true/false or 1/0 or yes/no");
00136    }
00137    virtual Validator *GetClone() const
00138    {
00139       return new BoolValidator();
00140    }
00141 };
00142 
00143 class BoolArrayValidator : public Validator
00144 {
00145 public:
00146    virtual bool Validate(const wxVariant &v)
00147    {
00148       wxString val;         // Validate a string of chars containing only 0, 1 and x.
00149       if (!v.Convert(&val)) 
00150          return false;
00151       SetConverted(val);   
00152       for(size_t i=0; i != val.Len(); i++)
00153          if( val[i] != '0' && val[i] != '1' && val[i] != 'x' && val[i] != 'X')
00154             return false;
00155       return true;
00156    }
00157    virtual wxString GetDescription() const
00158    {
00159       return wxT("0X101XX101...etc.  where 0=false, 1=true, and X=don't care.  Numbering starts at leftmost = track 0");
00160    }
00161    virtual Validator *GetClone() const
00162    {
00163       return new BoolArrayValidator();
00164    }
00165 };
00166 
00167 class DoubleValidator : public Validator
00168 {
00169 public:
00170    virtual bool Validate(const wxVariant &v)
00171    {
00172       double val;
00173       if (!v.Convert(&val)) return false;
00174       SetConverted(val);
00175       return GetConverted().IsType(wxT("double"));
00176    }
00177    virtual wxString GetDescription() const
00178    {
00179       return wxT("a floating-point number");
00180    }
00181    virtual Validator *GetClone() const
00182    {
00183       return new DoubleValidator();
00184    }
00185 };

00187 class RangeValidator : public Validator
00188 {
00189 private:
00190    double mLower, mUpper;
00191 public:
00192    RangeValidator(double l, double u)
00193       : mLower(l), mUpper(u)
00194    { }
00195    virtual bool Validate(const wxVariant &v)
00196    {
00197       double val;
00198       if (!v.Convert(&val)) return false;
00199       SetConverted(val);
00200       return ((mLower < val) && (val < mUpper));
00201    }
00202    virtual wxString GetDescription() const
00203    {
00204       return wxString::Format(wxT("between %d and %d"), mLower, mUpper);
00205    }
00206    virtual Validator *GetClone() const
00207    {
00208       return new RangeValidator(mLower, mUpper);
00209    }
00210 };
00211 
00212 class IntValidator : public Validator
00213 {
00214 public:
00215    virtual bool Validate(const wxVariant &v)
00216    {
00217       double val;
00218       if (!v.Convert(&val)) return false;
00219       SetConverted(val);
00220       if (!GetConverted().IsType(wxT("double"))) return false;
00221       return ((long)val == val);
00222    }
00223    virtual wxString GetDescription() const
00224    {
00225       return wxT("an integer");
00226    }
00227    virtual Validator *GetClone() const
00228    {
00229       return new IntValidator();
00230    }
00231 };
